vsParam:
*Sob sob*... Speaking of apples,
I can't help thinking about Colseit...

I really want to eat them...
Is the apple-picking season started...

Oh!? P, Peppermint!
I am sorry, I didn't notice you guys...

That's alright. Look!
These are the apples we picked this morning!

We chose them carefully to meet your standard♪
We closely observed everyone like this!

Er. [px] fell from the tree
because [px] was too concentrated!
To make Escha happy, this is nothing!

How... could that happen...
What if you get hurt!

Ah haw-haw...
It's good you are not injured.

We can guarantee the flavor!
Let's try the apples together, huh?

Er...
Uh, m, maybe... next time...

Hmm, we failed!?
Can't apples in Olbius touch Escha...

I, I am... sorry.
You picked apples for me, but I...

No, you don't have to apologize. It's natural for you
to get upset when you are in a new world.

But I hope that Escha can brace herself up.
If apples are no good, er...

Why don't we use these apples to make desserts?
Yummy things can bring vitality!

So, Escha the Glutton,
can you leave your stomach empty and wait a moment?

Alright! Let's make apple tart!
First we need to pick more and better apples!

Escha! Sorry to make you wait, here come the apple tarts!
I am not bragging, these apple tarts are our masterpiece!

They may not be as good as Colseit's apples,
all of us contributed to them.

You guys made it specially for me...
Thanks!

Compete... You are right! [px] and you guys,
thank you for taking care of me despite of your busy schedules!

Alright, it's our pleasure♪
Eat them while they are warm!

Okay!
I am going to start!

... Ah uh,
Er... ah, that's, so delicious!

Wonderful! We worked really hard
just to hear you say this!

Yes! Sorel always ate too much during the sampling,
we ran out of materials for several times!

B, big mouth!
Don't say it... out loud!

Ah, ah ha-ha!
That's why they are so delicious!

Escha!
Great! You are vibrant again!

Hee hee... To be honest, I still miss
Colseit's apples.

But, I get to eat so delicious apples in a different world,
and you guys made wonderful desserts to cheer me up...

I am very happy!
Thank you!
Ah, may I ask... is there any more apple tart?
Oh oh, Escha the Glutton is back!

No! I am not a glutton!
But the apple tarts are too good!

Haw-haw! Make some tea then,
we could sit down and slowly savor it♪
